Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Its amazing,but sometimes it breaks the music,but from there on its a great phone,no complaints the screen i sinply incredible with its 3d photos.

Reviews.Title: 1 week in and i really like it so far
Reviews.Author: Jimnarious
Reviews.Content: Like the title says I have had this phone for 1 week. I was worried when i first put the order in that the pictures didn't match the description. But this is certainly a Lg optimus 3d max P725. very nice phone . large very responsive multitouch capacitive screen. Not too large tho, fits in my pocket just fine. The 3d is better than i anticipated much better than a nintendo 3ds. The camera is sweet too very crisp pics, its better than my old motorola milestone . 3d video is neat too. I live in the states and had no trouble getting it activated on at&t; network thru straight talk. Going from spotty 3g to pretty steady 4g is a huge plus. I would recommend this phone to anyone that can actually see 3d.

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone
Reviews.Author: Mr Unconscious
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing, i cant describe it well, but is a must buy for 3D fans. You wont regreat buying this phone instead of Samsung galaxy or an iPhone. Everybody has that phones but this is one of a kind, perfect to showoff and a great gadget in general. Quality product at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Ksr
Reviews.Content: Everything is better than I expected from this phone. Design is great, screen and 3D very impressive. Battery lasts between 1.5 and 2 days with moderate use.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Kliber M. Pereira
Reviews.Content: This its a great phone, still using and abusing it, great travel companion to watch movies and listen to music, 3D camera to take amazing pics and share on Phereo, the WOW factor when showing to others its 3D stuff, no matter using an oudated android version the specs are enought for all the things you need to do with a phone, my favorite phone so far, old by nowaday standards but good for me a 3D lover.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cell phone. It is exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Jose Norberto Vieira Da Silva
Reviews.Content: Excellent cell phone. It is exactly what I expected. The images, videos and 3D games are excellent as well all other functions

Reviews.Title: LG OPTIMUS 3D MAX
Reviews.Author: HAITHAM-01
Reviews.Content: Good 3D main camera; 1080p video playback supportDolby Music improves sound qualityThe highlight of the handset is of course the fact that it offers a "glasses-free, full 3D experience"Apart from the bundled 3D content that includes games and videosthe phone also provides a 3D converter that lets you transform 2D content (even games) to 3DThe battery,1520 mAh unit managed to keep the device running for around a day under normal use that including a brief spot of gaming,which is decent by Android standardsThank you

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: Felesha
Reviews.Content: The phone is fine...however need a better battery. Having issue with the battery and actually looking for a better one for the phone right now.

Reviews.Title: terrible battery life
Reviews.Author: toys3
Reviews.Content: the battery life on this phone is ridiculous. i have to charge the phone three times per day and battery gets really hot at times. not satisfied with it at all, i expected better from lg. cant enjoy the phone to the fullest because of it. praise god for play store because the lg store is crap, esp for 3d apps.  ould not recommend this phone at all, the htc 3d is probably better.

ProductInfo.Features:
Leading LG 3D Max technology enables impactful 3D effect
2D-to-3D Converting Function
Ultra-Powerful 1.2GHz Dual Core Processor
Spacious 8GB Storage Capacity
Vibrant & Large 4.3" Display
ProductInfo.Name: LG P725 Black Optimus 3D Max Factory Unlocked GSM Cellular Phone
